name: Lost in Time (itch) (skizooo, MA4G, NocturnalNemesis)
description:
You were building a Time Machine, when the thing went haywire and fractured Time itself! Portals scattered around and everything was sent to different times. Collect some portals and power up the Machine again so you can return the flow back to normal and save the world (after almost dooming it)!

Made as part of Brackey's GameJam 2020.2

Devs:

Jake Nueslein

Tom Albrecht

Felipe
